title: Oahu Day 3 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Last day in the beautiful Oahu, we had some time before our flight to return to America, so we decided to do some hiking in the Hawaiian mountains. Our destination Manoa Falls a small walk to see a long fall, but a little crowded.

Later we were a little hesitate about our next destination; So, we finally went out to the Hanauma_Bay. We already visited this place the first day, but we loved so we spend about 4 hours in the sand and doing some snorkeling.
